import React,{useState}from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; const AddEducation = () => { const [formData,setFormData]=useState({ school:'', degree:'', fieldofstudy:'', from:'', to:'', current:false, description:'' }); const {school,degree,fieldofstudy,from,to,current,description}=formData; const onChange=(e)=>{ setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}); } return (

Add Your Education

Add any school, bootcamp, etc that you have attended

* = required field

From Date

setFormData({...formData,current:!current})}/>{' '} Current School or Bootcamp

To Date

Go Back
) } export default AddEducation
